introduction.sub-title: What I can help you with
introduction.title: My Services
introduction.text: These are the services that I am confident I can execute best when hired by your company. However, if there are different requirements for recruitment, don't worry, I will also strive to ensure the best completion of the tasks.

services.title: Front end
services.text: I specialize in front-end development, creating user-friendly interfaces with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I also have expertise in React.js library.

services.title: Back end
services.text: I excel in back-end development, working with frameworks like Node.js to build robust server-side applications.

services.title: App development
services.text: I have knowledge in app development for Android platforms, using technologies such as React Native and Flutter.

services.title: Other services
services.text: I am adaptable and capable of learning new technologies and frameworks to meet the unique needs of your project.
